caption.p: The local electronic state and chemical environment of Co-N 4/NC. a Comparison of Co K-edge XANES spectra of Co foil, CoO, Co 3O 4, CoPc, and Co-N 4/NC. b Fourier transform of the EXAFS spectra of Co foil, CoO, Co 3O 4, CoPc, and Co-N 4/NC. c, d EXAFS analysis of Co-N 4/NC at K and R space. The inset in d demonstrates the model derived from the EXAFS results. e Wavelet transform of Co K-edge XANES spectra of Co foil, CoO, Co 3O 4, CoPc, and Co-N 4/NC
